settings.title: What is Presence?
settings.text: Presence is an inspirational quote board for today’s world. It is a beautifully designed Inspiration Display, created to stream fresh daily inspiration into your home or office.

settings.title: How does it work?
settings.text: The Presence display is controlled by the Presence App which is designed to give you full control of your experience. It features simple, intuitive settings such as Sleep Mode, auto-dimming, and Ray Speed. Learn more about the presence app here.

settings.title: Presence Promise
settings.text:
We believe that you will love your Presence Inspiration Display. Every order is backed by our Presence Promise. It's our dedication to you to make sure you have the best experience and outcomes.

If you have any issues or the product does not meet your expectation, please contact us and we will be happy to help.

settings.title: Return policy
settings.text: It's our goal to make your experience positive. If for some reason you are unhappy with your purchase we have an easy return policy. Within 45 days from purchase please contact us and we will help process the return for you.

settings.quote: Presence is easy to set up right out of the box
Unlock the full potential of your display with the Presence App
Place your display in your home or office and enjoy the daily inspiration
You receive your Presence in 100% Recyclable Packaging. We also cut our impact on the environment by shipping your Presence in three components!
Every Presence purchase helps fund children’s mental health through the incredible Child Mind Institute

Try Presence for 45 Days and if you don’t absolutely love it, return it no questions asked. 
We want you to LOVE it.

settings.title: Real People, Real Presence
settings.subtitle: THE REVIEWS
settings.desc: Our customers are loving the Presence experience and sharing it with their world

settings.title: What is Presence?
settings.text: Presence is an inspirational quote board for today’s world. It is a beautifully designed Inspiration Display, created to stream fresh daily inspiration into your home or office.

settings.title: What is the science behind affirmations?
settings.text: Groundbreaking research has shown that when practiced affirmation does have the power to induce change in your life. Learn more about the science from our founders story here.

settings.title: What are Raylists?
settings.text: A Raylist is a collection of Rays based on a theme. This is what you play on your Presence. Think of it like a music playlist but for inspiration.

settings.title: How do I personalize my Presence?
settings.text: The Presence App is designed to give you full control of your experience and features simple, intuitive settings such as Sleep Mode, auto-dimming, and Ray Speed. Learn more about the presence app here.

settings.title: What is the Presence Promise?
settings.text: We believe that you will love your Presence. Every Presence order is backed by our happiness guarantee. If you have any issues or the product does not meet your expectation, please contact us and we will be happy to help. Our return policy is 45 days from purchase and our goal is to make your experience easy.
